label: deliveryNoteDocument
comment: A delivery note document referenced by this supply chain supply plan.

The delivery note document, at line level, referenced for this trade delivery.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.
